creator: yuri@tsoft.com
text:
This pertains to version 1.4.5. For some reason it hasn't been added to bugzilla versions list.

I am seeing these test failures:
Failed Tests            Total   Fail    Failed %
===================================================
testdso                     5      4     80.00%
testmmap                    8      3     37.50%
testshm                     5      2     40.00%

Running on Windows 7 running in turn on VirtualBox.

testdso: I hope to backport some changes from trunk before 1.4.6 to resolve this.

testmmap: The test has an unexpected dependency on the line ending format of the datafile, and building/testing from the Unix distribution tarball exposes the problem.  There's no known functional concern.

testshm: Run as Administrator (not related to MinGW)
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
> testmmap: The test has an unexpected dependency on the line ending format of ...
Please disable it on MinGW or fix line ending. People will keep reporting it if they see failures.

> testshm: Run as Administrator (not related to MinGW)
In such case, it's better if test will detect that administrator privileges are missing and report this.
creator: yuri@tsoft.com
gls@gknw.net
text: well, anytime you are dealing with a unix tarball on windows, it is best to run build/lineends.pl first
